description: Retrieves a list of runs for a specified canary.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the canary that you want to see runs for.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A token that indicates that there is more data available. You can use this token in a subsequent GetCanaryRuns operation to retrieve the next set of results.

parameters.name: RunType
parameters.description: When you provide RunType=CANARY_RUN and dryRunId, you will get an exception When a value is not provided for RunType, the default value is CANARY_RUN When CANARY_RUN is provided, all canary runs excluding dry runs are returned When DRY_RUN is provided, all dry runs excluding canary runs are returned.

nested_items.name: CanaryRuns
nested_items.description: An array of structures. Each structure contains the details of one of the retrieved canary runs.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique ID that identifies this canary run.

nested_items.name: ScheduledRunId
nested_items.description: The ID of the scheduled canary run.

nested_items.name: RetryAttempt
nested_items.description: The count in number of the retry attempt.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the run.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: If run of the canary failed, this field contains the reason for the error.

nested_items.name: StateReasonCode
nested_items.description: If this value is CANARY_FAILURE, either the canary script failed or Synthetics ran into a fatal error when running the canary. For example, a canary timeout misconfiguration setting can cause the canary to timeout before Synthetics can evaluate its status.

nested_items.name: TestResult
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of canary script for this run. When Synthetics tries to determine the status but fails, the result is marked as UNKNOWN. For the overall status of canary run, see State.

nested_items.name: Started
nested_items.description: The start time of the run.

nested_items.name: Completed
nested_items.description: The end time of the run.

nested_items.name: MetricTimestampForRunAndRetries
nested_items.description: The time at which the metrics will be generated for this run or retries.

nested_items.name: ArtifactS3Location
nested_items.description: The location where the canary stored artifacts from the run. Artifacts include the log file, screenshots, and HAR files.

nested_items.name: DryRunConfig
nested_items.description: Returns the dry run configurations for a canary.

nested_items.name: DryRunId
nested_items.description: The DryRunId associated with an existing canary's dry run. You can use this DryRunId to retrieve information about the dry run.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that indicates that there is more data available. You can use this token in a subsequent GetCanaryRuns operation to retrieve the next set of results.
